Name: Coin Pusher World
About the game: Twitch Account Is Required Coin Pusher World is a crowd-play game designed around a old arcade coin pusher machine experience to play with your community. The thrill of coin dropping is in the palm of your hand. Enjoy the ultimate coin pusher machine experience found at amusement arcades, carnivals and circus! Try to drop the coins carefully so that they can push the other medals and prizes off of the edge. To see game commands please see Timing in dropping the coin is the key in Coin Pusher World. IF YOU HAVE ANY ISSUES STARTING THE GAME OR SETTING UP PLEASE CONTACT US VIA Discord We do offer custom in game features and you would need to contact one of the team via discord or visit our website for more details on this. IF YOU REQUIRE HELP WITH SETTING UP YOUR GAME PLEASE JOIN US IN DISCORD AND CONTACT ONE OF THE ADMIN
